scenario.name: Success Call Establishment. Office Zone Announcement. CALLING SIDE
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:41910223031@ims.telef-data.es SIP/2.0 From: Alice <sip:1234567@atlanta.example.com>;tag=[call_number] To: Bob <sip:41910223031@ims.telef-data.es;user=phone> P-Asserted-Identity: "Mapachito" <sip:113022@ims.telef-data.es> X-BTNG: PBXCapabilities=EarlyStart FT-Ignore: Ignore this header. It is used to reduce scenarios overhead. P-Charging-Vector: icid-value=[clock_tick][pid];icid-generated-at=[local_ip];orig-ioi=home1.net Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 5 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 b=TIAS:8480 v=0
